createdby: This chat bot made by Xyz for small enquiry regarding business. I was created date :
welcome: Hello,I can guide you to hire developer for your project and help you to reach out them.
messageforemail: Please provide your email one of my supporting team will connect you soon.
areyourobot: Yes I am a robot but I am a smart one! Let me prove it. How can I help you?
iamgood: I am good . I hope you are doing well.
tellesomething: I am a chatbot which is a computer program that simulates and processes human conversation (either written or spoken), allowing humans to interact with digital devices as if they were communicating with a real person.
